title: Alpha Client
body: i have a friend who were bronze 3 and who applied for the alpha client after me and his request was accepted and my request (i was silver 4 when i  applied) is still pending, riot why hate me ? I just applied every time for these things and i didn't got an answer, i am an active player and i don't know why this happens . Please excuse my english , i know i am bad, but u know what i want to say. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: We aren't able to expedite Alpha client invitations, though, I was able to confirm your application was received.  As long as an account is level 30 and in good standing, all I can ask is for patience.  You'll be able to check the status of your application [here](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/alpha).  I wish you the best of luck with your application!
